amuse.nodes.validator.interfaces
Interface ValidationMetricCalculator

All Known Implementing Classes:
MeanSquaredError
public interface ValidationMetricCalculator

Methods which calculate one or more metrics should implement this interface.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
Igor Vatolkin

calculateMetric

ValidationMetric[] calculateMetric(java.util.ArrayList groundTruthRelationships,
                                   java.util.ArrayList classifierRelationships)
                                   throws NodeException
Calculates the metric

Parameters:
groundTruthRelationships - Ground truth relationships of classifier input (labeled relationships)
classifierRelationships - Relationships calculated by classifier (predicted relationships)
Returns:
Metric or null if this calculator does not support required classifiers
Throws:
NodeException

                                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> classifierRelationships)
                                         throws NodeException
Calculates the metric, if this calculator supports binary classifiers

Parameters:
groundTruthRelationships - Binary ground truth relationships of classifier input (labeled relationships)
classifierRelationships - Binary relationships calculated by classifier (predicted relationships)
Returns:
Metric or null if this calculator does not support binary classifiers
Throws:
NodeException

                                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> classifierRelationships)
                                        throws NodeException
Calculates the metric, if this calculator supports fuzzy classifiers

Parameters:
groundTruthRelationships - Fuzzy ground truth relationships of classifier input (labeled relationships)
classifierRelationships - Fuzzy relationships calculated by classifier (predicted relationships)
Returns:
Metric or null if this calculator does not support fuzzy classifiers
Throws:
NodeException

calculateMulticlassMetric

ValidationMetric[] calculateMulticlassMetric(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> groundTruthRelationships,
                                             java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> classifierRelationships)
                                             throws NodeException
Calculates the metric, if this calculator supports multiclass classifiers

Parameters:
groundTruthRelationships - Multiclass ground truth relationships of classifier input (labeled relationships)
classifierRelationships - Multiclass relationships calculated by classifier (predicted relationships)
Returns:
Metric or null if this calculator does not support multiclass classifiers
Throws:
NodeException
